review: So far from what my daughter has allowed me to use I am really enjoying it! ! I am very impressed at how simply it was to set up & the variety of different things it seems endless & a bit over whelming at first! My daughter is 11 she loves youtube & I was kinda broke this Christmas so thank goodness for the Fire TV especially getting it for $79!! She is in love with this thing & every single concept of the "smart" TV is amazing to her!! I will update later once I get to use more& they send my Kindle Fire HD hopefully SO OVER then February! ! I will update about the Internet & doing my work from the both!! I can't wait! ! So far it's a 5 star for being easy enough to use for a 11 yr old & myself who knows nothing about technology! ! And for it being the only thing that my daughter wanted for Christmas! ! And being totally fine with that!  Lol
